website_summaries.verdict: A classic Yorkshire glass mason jar beverage dispenser that can hold up to 2 gallons.
pros: This large, stable dispenser is made of glass so there are no worries of BPA, phthalate, PVC, or polycarbonate contaminating your beverage
Metal lid adds a satisfying nostalgic touch
cons: There are some leakage problems with the included plastic spigot that may be solved by upgrading to a stainless steel spigot
